title: 1963년 Browning 사건
summary: 미국 New York, NY 법원 판결 사건. 사건명: Browning. 판결일: 1963-12-27. 법원: Appellate Division of the Supreme Court of the State of New York.
description:
## 사건 정보

**사건명**: The People of the State of New York v. Lisbon Browning
**판결일**: 1963-12-27
**법원**: Appellate Division of the Supreme Court of the State of New York
**관할**: New York, NY

## 인용

- 20 A.D.2d 854

## 판결문 요약


On this application to vacate our prior decision dismissing the appeal the allegations made by petitioner that he was prevented from serving the necessary papers on appeal in time are referred to the Clinton 'Special Term of the Supreme Court for inquiry and report. Decision upon this application is withheld until the return of such report. [See People v. Browning, 20 A D 2d 853, 21 A D 2d 700.] Present — Bergan, P. J., Gibson, Herlihy, Reynolds and Taylor, JJ.
...
